title: The Lost Weekend
description: The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.

title: Mildred Pierce
description: A hardworking mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

title: Brief Encounter
description: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

title: Rome, Open City
description: During the Nazi occupation of Rome in 1944, the Resistance leader, Giorgio Manfredi, is chased by the Nazis as he seeks refuge and a way to escape.

title: Spellbound
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesia patient accused of murder while attempting to recover his memory.

title: The Bells of St. Mary's
description: At a big city Catholic school, Father O'Malley and Sister Benedict indulge in friendly rivalry, and succeed in extending the school through the gift of a building.

title: Leave Her to Heaven
description: A writer falls in love with a young socialite and they marry, but her obsessive love for him threatens to be the undoing of them both and everyone else around them.

title: Scarlet Street
description: A mild-mannered painter falls in love with a young woman who, along with her boyfriend, exploits him.

title: Detour
description: Chance events trap a hitchhiking nightclub pianist in a spiraling web of crime and tragedy.

title: A Tree Grows in Brooklyn
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A young girl comes of age in a Brooklyn tenement around the turn of the 20th century.

title: Anchors Aweigh
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: Two sailors, one naive, the other experienced in the ways of the world, on liberty in Los Angeles, meet a beautiful young aspiring singer.

title: Dead of Night

director.name: Alberto Cavalcanti, Charles Crichton, Basil Dearden, Robert Hamer

description: An architect senses impending doom as his half-remembered recurring dream turns into reality. The guests at the country house encourage him to stay as they take turns telling supernatural tales.

title: The Body Snatcher
description: A ruthless doctor and his young prize student find themselves continually harassed by their murderous supplier of illegal cadavers.

title: State Fair
description: The Frake family attends the Iowa State Fair, where parents seek prizes for their agricultural products, while their children find romance.

title: Children of Paradise
description: The theatrical life of a beautiful courtesan and the four men who love her.

title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
description: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty eternally, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.

title: They Were Expendable
description: A Navy commander fights to prove the battle-worthiness of the PT boat at the start of World War II.

title: The Story of G.I. Joe
description: War correspondent Ernie Pyle joins Company C, 18th Infantry, as this American army unit fights its way across North Africa and up the Italian peninsula.

title: A Walk in the Sun
description: During the invasion of Italy in World War II, a single platoon of American soldiers tries to take out a fortified German farmhouse.

title: The House on 92nd Street
description: The FBI uncovers a Nazi spy ring operating in New York City during World War II.

title: The Seventh Veil
description: A suicidal concert pianist undergoes hypnotherapy to uncover the roots of her emotional instability.

title: Blithe Spirit
description: A spiritualist medium holds a séance for a writer suffering from writer's block but accidentally summons the spirit of his deceased first wife.

title: The Clock
description: A soldier on a two-day leave in New York City meets a girl and they fall in love, but have to contend with the city's frantic pace.

title: The Corn Is Green
description: A spinster teacher is determined to bring education to a Welsh coal mining town, despite strong opposition.

title: Fallen Angel
description: A drifting con man arrives in a small town and falls for a waitress, but marries a wealthy woman for her money.

title: Objective, Burma!
description: A U.S. Army platoon parachutes into Burma to destroy a Japanese radar station, but their escape route is cut off.

title: Isle of the Dead
description: On a Greek island during the 1912 Balkan War, several people are trapped by a quarantine for the plague and terrorized by superstitions of vampires.

title: The Valley of Decision
description: A maid in a Pittsburgh steel tycoon's home falls in love with his son, amidst labor disputes and family conflicts.

title: A Song to Remember
description: The life story of Polish composer and pianist Frédéric Chopin and his patriotic desire to help his country.

title: Our Vines Have Tender Grapes
description: The story of a Norwegian farming community in Wisconsin, seen through the eyes of a young girl.

title: The Enchanted Cottage
description: A disfigured war veteran and a plain young woman marry for companionship, only to find that their love transforms them in each other's eyes.

title: Pride of the Marines
description: The true story of Al Schmid, a Marine who was blinded by a grenade during the battle of Guadalcanal.

title: Rhapsody in Blue
description: A fictionalized biography of the American composer and pianist George Gershwin.

title: Love Letters
description: A soldier writes love letters for his friend to a woman, and then falls in love with her himself after his friend dies.

title: The Wicked Lady
description: A bored noblewoman turns to a secret life of crime as a highwayman, teaming up with a notorious bandit.

title: Hangover Square
description: A brilliant composer with a split personality lapses into a murderous state whenever he hears discordant sounds.

title: Cornered
description: A Canadian veteran hunts down the Nazi collaborators who killed his French wife during the war, leading him to Argentina.

title: Wonder Man
description: A flamboyant nightclub singer is murdered by the mob and returns as a ghost to persuade his studious twin brother to bring the killers to justice.

title: And Then There Were None
description: Ten people are invited to an isolated island, only to be killed off one by one, with each death corresponding to a line from a nursery rhyme.

title: Conflict
description: A man murders his wife to be with her sister, but becomes convinced that she is still alive.

title: Christmas in Connecticut
description: A food writer who has lied about being the perfect housewife must try to cover her deception when her boss and a returning war hero invite themselves to her home for a traditional family Christmas.

title: The Spanish Main
description: A Dutch pirate captain rescues the daughter of the Spanish Viceroy from an arranged marriage, earning her love and the enmity of her betrothed.

title: Saratoga Trunk
description: A Creole woman returns to New Orleans to scandalize society and find a wealthy husband, but falls for a Texan gambler.

title: Son of Lassie
description: Lassie's son, Laddie, proves his courage when he stows away on a bomber and parachutes into German-occupied Norway with his master.

title: Tarzan and the Amazons
description: Tarzan helps a group of archaeologists find a lost city of Amazons, but trouble ensues when they try to plunder its treasures.

title: The Woman in Green
description: Sherlock Holmes investigates a series of murders in London where each victim has had a finger severed.

title: The House of Fear
description: Sherlock Holmes investigates a series of deaths among the members of a club who have all named each other as beneficiaries in their insurance policies.

title: Pursuit to Algiers
description: Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson escort the heir to a foreign throne on a ship to Algiers to protect him from assassins.

title: Blood on the Sun
description: In pre-World War II Japan, an American newspaper editor uncovers a Japanese plot to conquer the world.

title: Captain Kidd
description: The story of the infamous pirate Captain Kidd who tricks the King into commissioning him as an escort for a treasure ship.
